text: Hi, everyone! :wave: I have a client who wants to integrate their CRM, Profit Finder Pro, with their HubSpot. I'm looking for a freelance developer who could facilitate this. Please DM me if interested and include your hourly rate. Thanks!
Hey Caitlin, we have in-house devs! Is that something you would be interested in? Or are you looking for freelancers only? :thinking_face:
Open to in-house devs, too! Mainly looking for a quote right now, so we can give our client an idea of what this would cost.
Ohh okay, I'll send you a dm
